title: Fort McHenry National Monument and Historic Shrine: Nearby Attractions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Nearby Attractions              Nearby Attractions        National Park Service Areas  Antietam National Battlefield - 80mi  Catoctin Mountain Park - 70mi  Gettysburg National Military Park - 60mi  Greenbelt Park - 30mi  Hampton National Historic Site - 20mi  Harpers Ferry National Historical Park - 70mi  Monocacy National Battlefield - 50mi Other Attractions  Hancock's Resolution - 25mi  The Flag House & Star-Spangled Banner Museum  - 4mi  The Maryland Historical Society Museum - 8mi  Todd's Inheritance Historic Site - 15mi  USS Constellation Museum - 3mi Visit Baltimore - it's not so much a place as an experience. And after close to three hundred years of history, this city can deliver more fun-filled family days (and romantic evenings) to make any vacation an absolute winner.
